name: Celest
description:
Move the stars to recreate constellations.

Celest is a relaxing game which challenges your precision. Drag and drop the stars at the right spot to copy constellations.

Celest features:
- 100 levels to unlock, and more coming!
- A story mode with Mythology ties
- Challenging endless mode
- Relaxing sound atmosphere

Which precision level can you reach? Explore the space to discover it.

Celest is free so you can share it with everyone you know.
